Package ucd.java.rps.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RPSC_GameLeaderBoard
    This controller is created to set the table view of Game Records from database to view
    RPSC_InputValidations
    This controller is defined to validate the input data passed from view to controller
    RPSC_NewGame
    This is first controller designed to get the inputs of player, validate them, and pass it through next controller and load the view
    RPSC_PlayerOne
    This controller is defined to get the values of player two from view PlayerOne.fxml Also is used to receive the data from player one and on the basis of boolean operator isLoadedfirst (if true) sending values to next controller (Player two) with current values else take values from first controller
    RPSC_PlayerRecords
    This controller is defined to set a view of player records from database
    RPSC_PlayerTwo
    THis controller is defined to get the values of player two from view PlayerTwo.fxml Also is used to receive the data on the basis of boolean operator isLoadedfirst (if true) sending values to next controller (Player One) with current values else take values from first controller
